articles.title: European Southern Observatory releases new image of Orion’s Flame Nebula - The Indian Express
articles.description: The image was taken using the Atacama Pathfinder Experiment.
articles.content: The European Southern Observatory has released a new image of Orions Flame Nebula. Named NGC 2024, the Flame Nebula is a large star-forming region located in the Orion constellation situated about 1,… [+2095 chars]
